trans-unit.source: Provides the managed definition of the <see langword="IPersistFile" /> interface, with functionality from <see langword="IPersist" />.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile` and `IPersist` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez la documentation existante pour `IPersistFile` et `IPersist` dans MSDN library.

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT.
trans-unit.target: Le common language runtime lève une exception lorsqu’une méthode COM en code natif retourne un HRESULT.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez [Comment : mappage HRESULT et des Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a reference to the CLSID.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Retrieves the class identifier (CLSID) of an object.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IPersist::GetClassID` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez la documentation existante pour `IPersist::GetClassID` dans MSDN library.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a zero-terminated string containing the path for the current file, or the default file name prompt (such as *.txt).
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Retrieves either the absolute path to the current working file of the object or, if there is no current working file, the default file name prompt of the object.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::GetCurFile` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez la documentation existante pour `IPersistFile::GetCurFile` dans MSDN library.

trans-unit.source: Checks an object for changes since it was last saved to its current file.
<see langword="S_OK" /> if the file has changed since it was last saved; <see langword="S_FALSE" /> if the file has not changed since it was last saved.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::IsDirty` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez la documentation existante pour `IPersistFile::IsDirty` dans MSDN library.

trans-unit.source: A zero-terminated string containing the absolute path of the file to open.
A combination of values from the <see langword="STGM" /> enumeration to indicate the access mode in which to open <c>pszFileName</c>.
Opens the specified file and initializes an object from the file contents.
The `STGM` enumeration is not part of the .NET Framework, but is documented in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: Le `STGM` énumération ne fait pas partie du .NET Framework, mais est documentée dans MSDN library.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::Load` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez la documentation existante pour `IPersistFile::Load` dans MSDN library.

trans-unit.source: A zero-terminated string containing the absolute path of the file to which the object is saved.
<see langword="true" /> to used the <c>pszFileName</c> parameter as the current working file; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
Saves a copy of the object into the specified file.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::Save` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez la documentation existante pour `IPersistFile::Save` dans MSDN library.

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file where the object was previously saved.
Notifies the object that it can write to its file.
For more information, see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::SaveCompleted` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez la documentation existante pour `IPersistFile::SaveCompleted` dans MSDN library.
